stories.text:
Say you have some state being rendered into pixels at 60FPS.

If the state-space/domain was constrained enough, could you train a model that has high performance and looks intelligible?
stories.title: Ask HN: Could an ML model do a good job rendering in a game loop?
Nearly All the Chinook Salmon in the Sacramento River Will Die

stories.text:
I'm a software engineer working on exposing frontends and APIs for monolithic backends (that already doe the job). I work for an HR company and basically 90% of job is display data coming from those backends. Sometimes we need to have an orchestration layer. Most of the time is spent on designing APIs.

As a student I had always been told that in computing maths are fundamental.

Q : As a software engineer in exposing APIs and frontends, have you ever make use of advanced Maths ? Not necessarily algebra : continuity, limits, integral, etc.

Regards
stories.title: Ask HN: As an API/Front end developer, have you ever used maths?
Graham says he'll follow the lead of Dems and leave for vote on spending bill
